title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe Congress’ oversight power and explain why the Framers of the Constitution gave Congress this power.

For Task A2, the response must explain why the Framers of the Constitution gave Congress this power.

For Task B, the response must explain how the actions taken by Congress could affect the operations of the IRS in the future.

For Task C1, the response must describe how the scenario illustrates the bureaucracy’s role in policy making.

For Task C2, the response must explain how that role could conflict with the agenda of another branch of government.
